translations: 金库（coffer 的复数）；花格镶板（屋顶或墙上的凹陷）
用花格镶板装饰；把……珍藏起来（coffer 的三单形式）

sentences.sentence: If you believe, as many do, that wealth inequality is inherently bad, then these taxes improve society while also swelling govern we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao  coffers.
sentences.translation: 如果你像许多人一样，认为财富不平等从根本上就不好，那么这些税收在改善社会的同时，也充实了政府的金库。
